about.description:
`mne-base` contains the basic functionality for data analysis and 2D
visualization. For full functionality, including 3D visualization,
use the `mne` package instead. `mne-installer-menus` is only used by the
standalone installers and should not be installed manually.
about.summary: MNE-Python is a software for MEG and EEG data analysis.

name: mne-installer-menus
raw_recipe:

requirements:
  build:
    - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
    - _openmp_mutex 4.5 2_gnu
    - libgcc-ng 11.2.0 h1d223b6_16
    - libgomp 11.2.0 h1d223b6_16
    - sed 4.8 he412f7d_0
  host:
    - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
    - _openmp_mutex 4.5 2_gnu
    - bzip2 1.0.8 h7f98852_4
    - ca-certificates 2021.10.8 ha878542_0
    - ld_impl_linux-64 2.36.1 hea4e1c9_2
    - libffi 3.4.2 h7f98852_5
    - libgcc-ng 11.2.0 h1d223b6_16
    - libgomp 11.2.0 h1d223b6_16
    - libnsl 2.0.0 h7f98852_0
    - libuuid 2.32.1 h7f98852_1000
    - libzlib 1.2.11 h166bdaf_1014
    - ncurses 6.3 h27087fc_1
    - openssl 3.0.2 h166bdaf_1
    - python 3.10.4 h2660328_0_cpython
    - readline 8.1 h46c0cb4_0
    - sqlite 3.38.2 h4ff8645_0
    - tk 8.6.12 h27826a3_0
    - tzdata 2022a h191b570_0
    - xz 5.2.5 h516909a_1
    - zlib 1.2.11 h166bdaf_1014
  run:
    - mne-base
    - python >=3.7
    - spyder
test:
  commands:
    - test -f ${CONDA_PREFIX}/Menu/mne.json
    - test -f ${CONDA_PREFIX}/Menu/mne_sys_info.py
    - test -f ${CONDA_PREFIX}/Menu/mne_open_prompt.applescript
    - test -f ${CONDA_PREFIX}/Menu/mne_open_prompt.sh
    - test -f ${CONDA_PREFIX}/Menu/mne_open_prompt.bat
    - test `ls ${CONDA_PREFIX}/Menu/mne_spyder.*  | wc -l` -eq 3
    - test `ls ${CONDA_PREFIX}/Menu/mne_console.* | wc -l` -eq 3
    - test `ls ${CONDA_PREFIX}/Menu/mne_info.*    | wc -l` -eq 3
    - test `ls ${CONDA_PREFIX}/Menu/mne_web.*     | wc -l` -eq 3
    - test `ls ${CONDA_PREFIX}/Menu/mne_forum.*   | wc -l` -eq 3
    - test -f ${CONDA_PREFIX}/Menu/mne.png
about:
  description: '`mne-base` contains the basic functionality for data analysis and
    2D

    visualization. For full functionality, including 3D visualization,

    use the `mne` package instead. `mne-installer-menus` is only used by the

    standalone installers and should not be installed manually.

    '
  dev_url: https://github.com/mne-tools/mne-python
  doc_url: http://mne.tools
  home: http://mne.tools
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: MNE-Python is a software for MEG and EEG data analysis.
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - christianbrodbeck
    - hoechenberger
    - larsoner

about.description:
`mne-base` contains the basic functionality for data analysis and 2D
visualization. For full functionality, including 3D visualization,
use the `mne` package instead. `mne-installer-menus` is only used by the
standalone installers and should not be installed manually.
about.summary: MNE-Python is a software for MEG and EEG data analysis.
